section.heading: Applicability to certain federal employees.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-85: § 3 of D.C. Law 23-85 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 23-85 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-85: § 3 of D.C. Law 23-85 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 23-85 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
